pages.text: 礦石處理的最後一步能有四倍產出。你將需要一台 $(l:machines/basic_machines#fluid_infuser)$(t:Go to Fluid Infuser)$(l)$(o)Fluid Infuser$(), $(l:machines/basic_machines#smelter)$(t:Go to Industrial Smelter)$(l)$(o)Industrial Smelter$(), $(l:machines/basic_machines#condenser)$(t:Go to Condenser)$(l)$(o)Condenser$(), $(l:machines/basic_machines#pulverizer)$(t:Go to Pulverizer)$(l)$(o)Pulverizer$() 和足量的硫酸。$(br)$(#3ead36)Sulfuric Acid$() 生成於沼澤的湖中，或以 $(#b3b332)Sulfur Dust$() 和 $(#88adf2)Water$() 在液體注入機中合成。

$(l)1)$() Insert your ore in a Fluid Infuser with Sulfuric Acid. It will purify them and give you the purified ore form. $(br)$(l)2)$() Insert your purified ores into an Industrial Smelter. It will smelt them into their fluid forms.$(br)2) Move your molten ore into a Condenser.$(br)$(l)3)$() Pulverize your Ore Chunk, which will then give you a dust.$(br)$(l)4)$() Smelt your dust.$(br2)Done! Now you've transformed 1 ore into 4 ingots!
